mapper.sql: select * from dv_job where datasource_id = #{datasourceId} and type = #{type}
mapper.select:
select p.id, p.name, p.schema_name ,p.table_name,p.column_name, p.type, u.username as updater, p.update_time, s.cron_expression from () p left join `dv_user` u on u.id = p.create_by left join `dv_job_schedule` s on p.id = s.job_id and s.status = 1
LOWER(p.`name`) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{searchVal})), '%')
order by p.update_time desc

select p.id, p.name, p.schema_name ,p.table_name,p.column_name, p.type, u.username as updater, p.update_time, s.cron_expression from () p left join `dv_user` u on u.id = p.create_by left join `dv_job_schedule` s on p.id = s.job_id and s.status = 1
LOWER(p.`name`) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{searchVal})), '%')
LOWER(p.schema_name) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{schemaSearch})), '%')
LOWER(p.table_name) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{tableSearch})), '%')
LOWER(p.column_name) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{columnSearch})), '%')
and p.update_time >= #{startTime}
and p.update_time <= #{endTime}
order by p.update_time desc
